genre_description: A gritty action thriller set in Manila's underground fighting circuit, following a haunted fighter's quest for redemption and the dismantling of a sinister chemical-control facility.

ai_characters.name: Seraphine (Atlas)
ai_characters.description: Originally a breathing and meditation app, Seraphine evolved into a sophisticated tactical and emotional confidant for Jake, providing real-time data, vital monitoring, and moral support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jake's vitals and provides calming breathing exercises to manage stress and PTSD symptoms.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate is stable. A touch elevated. You’re okay. Inhale for four, hold for four.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and intercepts incoming communications to detect deception and provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: He has not provided a name. Ask for a name. ... The speed of his affirmation correlates with previous instances of capitulation preceding betrayal.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence on guard positions, camera blind spots, and patrol patterns.
behaviors.quote: Two guards coming along the west rail. They walk like nightshift men who want coffee. One rubs his shoulder.

behaviors.description: Maps complex physical environments and identifies weak points in infrastructure for sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Coolant. The compressor cycle you heard is at steady oscillation. Stress the line at the elbow joint there. Forty-five degrees, three short bends.

behaviors.description: Coordinates movements between multiple human allies during a high-stakes infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Route the second wave to the utility spine after they break the right gate. Sal needs bodies to hold what he took.

behaviors.description: Offers moral validation and emotional support during the protagonist's moments of doubt.
behaviors.quote: Your heart is good. Whatever happens, it’s good.

project_assessment.explanation: Seraphine is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI companion. She enhances the protagonist's capabilities and emotional well-being without infringing on his autonomy. Her role is purely supportive, providing critical information and grounding techniques that allow the human characters to successfully fight back against a coercive and malevolent system.
